Impostor is one of the first Among Us private servers, written in C#.

The latest version supported is 2020.9.22, both desktop and mobile.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt -y update
apt -y upgrade
apt -y --no-install-recommends install wget curl jq unzip tar redis-server file ca-certificates apt-utils

#export HOME=/mnt/server
#cd $HOME
cd /mnt/server
echo $PWD

## get release info and download links
LATEST_RELEASE=$(curl -L -s -H 'Accept: application/json' https://github.com/${GITHUB_PACKAGE}/releases/latest)
LATEST_VERSION_WITHV=$(echo $LATEST_RELEASE | sed -e 's/.*"tag_name":"\([^"]*\)".*/\1/')
LATEST_VERSION=$(echo $LATEST_VERSION_WITHV | sed 's/v//' )
echo $LATEST_VERSION_WITHV
echo $LATEST_VERSION
echo $PWD

if [ -z "${VERSION}" ] || [ "${VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
    DOWNLOAD_LINK="https://github.com/${GITHUB_PACKAGE}/releases/download/v${LATEST_VERSION}/Impostor-Server_${LATEST_VERSION}_linux-x64.tar.gz"
    echo "Using Latest Version Number"
    echo $PWD
    
    echo $DOWNLOAD_LINK
    wget $DOWNLOAD_LINK
    chmod 777 Impostor-Server_${LATEST_VERSION}_linux-x64.tar.gz
    
    tar -xf Impostor-Server_${LATEST_VERSION}_linux-x64.tar.gz
    rm -fR Impostor-Server_${LATEST_VERSION}_linux-x64.tar.gz
    chmod +x Impostor.Server
    echo $PWD
else 
    DOWNLOAD_LINK="https://github.com/${GITHUB_PACKAGE}/releases/download/v${VERSION}/Impostor-Server_${VERSION}_linux-x64.tar.gz"
    echo "Using Specified Version Number."
    echo $PWD
    
    echo $DOWNLOAD_LINK
    wget $DOWNLOAD_LINK
    chmod 777 Impostor-Server_${LATEST_VERSION}_linux-x64.tar.gz
    
    tar -xf Impostor-Server_${VERSION}_linux-x64.tar.gz
    rm -fR Impostor-Server_${VERSION}_linux-x64.tar.gz
    chmod +x Impostor.Server
    echo $PWD
fi
